paragraphs.heading: Deputy Manager - Full time position
paragraphs.content:
Are you looking for an opportunity where your skills will make a difference and will be used to have an impact in people’s lives?

Graih, one of the island’s homeless charities, is offering an exciting opportunity. We are looking for an enthusiastic individual to work with the Manager, supporting with the running of the Drop-in, Community Support and Emergency Night Shelter services as well as having a voice in shaping the future of this Charity!

This is a unique opportunity to work for a pioneering charity, and building relationship with some of the most vulnerable people in our society.

Download the [full job description and person specification](/img/deputy-manager-role-profile.doc).

To apply, please send your CV and Cover letter to: [info@graih.org.im](mailto:info@graih.org.im)

Applications must be received by **5pm Monday 18th July 2022**.

paragraphs.heading: Relief/Bank Night shelter Support Worker
paragraphs.content:
We are always willing to hearing from people who would be interested in joining our team at Graih as a relief support worker in the Emergency Night Shelter.

This will be to provide cover in the Night Shelter when a gap arises and will be on an as and when basis. This is a great opportunity to get to know the Charity, the staff team and our Guests.

Download the [full job description and person specification](https://sleepy-knuth-43c8bb.netlify.app/img/pdf-bank-night-shelter-support-worker-role-profile.pdf).

If this is something you are interested in, Please contact us on: [info@graih.org.im](mailto:info@graih.org.im) 

There is no closing date for this position, we are always interested in widening our relief support worker pool.
